description:
Valeo Resources has partnered with a community mental health/SUD organization organization. We are currently seeking candidates for a full-time SUD Clinical Manager to join the team in Los Angeles, CA! In this role, you will be overseeing the residential substance use disorder (SUD) program which is a new program contracted with Department of Public Health's (DPH) Substance Abuse Prevention and Control (SAPC) program for residential drug Medi-Cal (DMC) services for up to 99 adult men and women.

Position: Clinical Manager

Location: Los Angeles, CA 90059

Schedule: M-F, day shifts (Full time - W2)

Responsibilities

  • Manages day to day program operations and oversight of assigned programs and facility.
  • Responsible for all facility related matters to ensure that program(s) operate efficiently and safely.
  • Assumes ownership for any facility or program crisis situation and sees it through to completion.
  • Responsible for program staff providing treatment in accordance with our mission and values.
  • Ensures for all treatment services are provided in an ethical and legal manner.

Requirements:

  • LCSW, LMFT, LPCC, or PsyD with license through Board of Behavioral Sciences (BBS) or the California Board of Psychology (CBP).
  • Experience Minimum of two years' experience providing supervision to direct service providers in comparable size agencies with similar clients.
  • Experience with efficient and effective treatment and management of adult clients with co-occurring mental health and substance use disorders.

Benefits And Perks

  • Robust benefits package, including PTO, 15 paid holidays, commuter benefits, retirement plans, and more!
  • Employees qualify for public loan forgiveness programs
  • Training and professional development opportunities
  • Work with mission driven, compassionate colleagues and make a difference every day in the work that you do

Please send your resume to Gia at ggonzalez@valeoresources.com to learn more about the position and interview process!
